scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn submodule_copy && yarn build-html
scripts.setup: git submodule update --init && git pull --recurse-submodules && yarn submodule_copy
scripts.submodule_copy:
cp submodules/blockchain/README.md docs/blockchain/repo/tlbc.md && echo '---''
''layout: blockchain''
''title: Trustlines Blockchain''
''---''
' | cat - docs/blockchain/repo/tlbc.md > temp && mv temp docs/blockchain/repo/tlbc.md && cp submodules/clientlib/README.md docs/clientlib/repo/clientlib.md && echo '---''
''layout: clientlib''
''title: Client library introduction''
''---''
' | cat - docs/clientlib/repo/clientlib.md > temp && mv temp docs/clientlib/repo/clientlib.md && cp submodules/clientlib/docs/guides.md docs/clientlib/repo/clientlib-guides.md && echo '---''
''layout: clientlib''
''title: Client library guides''
''---''
' | cat - docs/clientlib/repo/clientlib-guides.md > temp && mv temp docs/clientlib/repo/clientlib-guides.md && cp submodules/contracts/README.rst docs/contracts/repo/contracts_README.md && echo '---''
''layout: contracts''
''title: Trustlines Smart Contract Platform''
''---''
' | cat - docs/contracts/repo/contracts_README.md > temp && mv temp docs/contracts/repo/contracts_README.md && cp submodules/relay/README.rst docs/relay/repo/relay_server.md && echo '---''
''layout: relay''
''title: Trustlines relay server''
''---''
' | cat - docs/relay/repo/relay_server.md > temp && mv temp docs/relay/repo/relay_server.md && cp submodules/relay/docs/RelayAPI.md docs/relay/repo/relay-api.md && echo '---''
''layout: relay''
''title: Trustlines Relay API''
''---''
' | cat - docs/relay/repo/relay-api.md > temp && mv temp docs/relay/repo/relay-api.md && cp submodules/relay/docs/RelayServer.md docs/relay/repo/running_trustlines_system.md && echo '---''
''layout: relay''
''title: Running the Trustlines system''
''---''
' | cat - docs/relay/repo/running_trustlines_system.md > temp && mv temp docs/relay/repo/running_trustlines_system.md && cp submodules/relay/docker/trustlines/README.md docs/relay/repo/trustlines_docker.md && echo '---''
''layout: relay''
''title: Running Trustlines via docker-compose''
''---''
' | cat - docs/relay/repo/trustlines_docker.md > temp && mv temp docs/relay/repo/trustlines_docker.md
scripts.clean: rm docs/blockchain/repo/*.md && rm docs/clientlib/repo/*.md && rm docs/contracts/repo/*.md && rm docs/relay/repo/*.md
scripts.deploy: git checkout gh-pages && git merge master && git push && git checkout master
